sourcesContent:
import { Container, Box, Heading, Text } from '@chakra-ui/react';
import React from 'react';

const Homepage = () => {
  return (
    <Container maxW='xl' centerContent>
      <Box
        d="flex"
        flexDirection="column" // Adjust layout to column
        alignItems="center" // Center-align items
        p={6} // Increase padding for a more spacious feel
        bgGradient="linear(to-t, #4e74a2, #43698f)" // Gradient background
        borderRadius="md" // Add a slight border radius
        boxShadow="lg" // Add a shadow for depth
      >
        <Heading
          as="h2"
          size="xl"
          color="white" // Text color
          fontWeight="bold" // Make text bold
          mb={4} // Add margin bottom for separation
        >
          Welcome to Intelli Chat
        </Heading>
        <Text
          fontSize="lg"
          color="white" // Text color
          mb={6} // Add margin bottom for separation
        >
          Connect, chat, and share moments in real-time.
        </Text>
        {/* Your additional chat-related components can go here */}
      </Box>
      <Text
        fontSize={['2xl', '3xl', '4xl']} // Responsive font size
        fontFamily="Pacifico, cursive" // Custom creative font
        fontWeight="bold" // Make the text bold
        color={['purple.500', 'teal.500', 'black']} // Responsive text color
        textAlign="center" // Center-align the text
        fontStyle="italic" // Make the text italicized
        textShadow="2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" // Add a subtle text shadow
      >
        Intelli Chat
      </Text>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default Homepage;
